Stairs.title: Stairs to the Upper Reaches
Stairs.description: This leads to the west part of the Upper Reaches.

Stairs.title: Stairs to the Lower Reaches
Stairs.description: This leads to the south-east part of the Lower Reaches.

Stairs.title: Tomb of the Avatar
Stairs.description: This leads to the Tomb of the Avatar.

Stairs.title: Marble Steps
Stairs.description: This leads to the Marble Steps.

Stairs.title: Marble Boss Room
Stairs.description: This leads to the Marble Boss Room.

Stairs.title: Anhk Room
Stairs.description: This leads to the Anhk Room.

Stairs.title: Back to Level 3
Stairs.description: This leads back to the south-east part of Level 3.

Breakable Wall.title: Breakable Walls
Breakable Wall.description: Left click to break the wall.

Secret Passageways.title: Hidden bridge entrance
Secret Passageways.description: You can go North off the bridge and inside to travel to a secret paradise. Beware.

Secret Passageways.title: The Greed Room
Secret Passageways.description: Speak the words in the book to enter. Great wealth is in your future...

Secret Passageways.title: Lower Exodus Lair
Secret Passageways.description: Hit the lever in the room to the south east to trigger a portal leading down

Rel Por Stones.title: Rel Por Stone
Rel Por Stones.description: Teleports you to a nearby area. Say 'Vas Rel Por' to use.

Portals.title: Portal to the ship
Portals.description: Interact with the model ship twice to open the portal. This teleports you to a ship lost in time.

Portals.title: Portal back to the model ship
Portals.description: This returns you to the model ship.

Portals.title: Portal back to Level 3
Portals.description: This takes you to the west side of the Ettin area.

Portals.title: Upper Exodus Lair
Portals.description: This returns you to the upper area.

Portals.title: Living Weapons Area
Portals.description: This takes you to a room with Living Weapons and another portal to go deeper.

Portals.title: Return to Level 3
Portals.description: This takes you back to the top of Level 3

Portals.title: Anhk Portal
Portals.description: This takes you near the Anhk room.

Portals.title: Return to Living Weapons area
Portals.description: This takes you back to where the Living Weapons are.

Portals.title: Sea Serpent Grotto
Portals.description: This takes you to the Sea Serpent Grotto.

Portals.title: East of Anhk Room
Portals.description: This takes you back to east side of Level 3.

Portals.title: Gold Room
Portals.description: This is where you appear if you speak the magic words in the book. Grab the gold!

Teleport Tiles.title: Teleport Tile
Teleport Tiles.description: Teleports you into Sewers. This is tile is not visible. Simple open the door with knock and then run straight into the cell and you will be teleported. No gems are required

Waystar.title: Waystar
Waystar.description: Summons a moongate to Colony for a short duration. Say 'Vas Rel Por' to use.

Knock.title: Knock
Knock.description:
All Doors within 3 tiles become opened and stay unlocked for 15 seconds
Each Chest within 3 tiles has a 50% chance to become unlocked

Bosses.title: Exodus Progressive Spawn
Bosses.description: Special: Teleports and drops void bombs. You must kill the Exodus MK1-5 to spawn the boss.

Bosses.title: Anhk Room Bosses
Bosses.description: There are many bosses here and I will add more detailed descriptions in the future.

Bosses.title: Alpha Shadow Wolf
Bosses.description: Special: Revealer, Stealths and does a backstab

Bosses.title: Navery Nighteyes
Bosses.description: Special: Summons spiders and does Nemesis. This is a progressive spawn: Kill the spiders until the boss spawns

Bosses.title: Old Friend Of Captain Johne
Bosses.description: Special: Casts spells. There are a few of these mobs throughout the ship

Bosses.title: The Catalyst Eye
Bosses.description: Special: Targeted single target burst that applies a bleed

Bosses.title: The Barrier Warden
Bosses.description: Special: Does a pontiff style bomb

Bosses.title: The Sleeper
Bosses.description: Special: Does heavy melee hits and applies frequent poison

Bosses.title: Epochal Lich Lord
Bosses.description: Special: Spawns waves of mobs and cast spells

Revealers.title: Greater Gazer
Revealers.description: Reveals in a large radius. Does a heavy single target burst that bleeds.

Traps.title: Crystal Trap
Traps.description: Beware. When you step deep enough in the room the doorway will fill with crystals and two powerful revealing wisps will spawn. You can rope through the crystals.

Traps.title: Treasure Room Trap
Traps.description: There is a Greater Smoke Dragon inside!

Levers.title: Exodus Lever
Levers.description: Opens the gate down to the inner Exodus area.

Anhks.title: Anhk
Anhks.description: This will bring you back to life. Hide immediatly upon use.

Quest NPCs.title: Stew Quest Start
Quest NPCs.description: Say stew to get the recipe from the goblins.

Quest NPCs.title: Stew Quest Turn-in
Quest NPCs.description: Double click the pot repeatedly to cook the stew. You can then turn into the troll with the right phrase

Quest Items.title: Port
Quest Items.description: The bottle of port for the stew.

Quest Items.title: Stew Ingredient
Quest Items.description: Say Krompf to get the goblin to appear. You must have one bloom rune to trade for what you need

Quest Items.title: Rotworm Flesh
Quest Items.description: This a common drop off the Rotworms in the area.

Quest Items.title: Goblin Soap
Quest Items.description: Spawns in the chest on the table. This is for a quest at Colony.

Quest Items.title: Tear of the Tides
Quest Items.description: Approach the sparkling magic with an ancient coin and recite 'Fate and fortune, fire and tide, reveal the gift that you now hide'; This will spawn a miniboss that will drop the quest item.
